products.title: Ecowood Espresso Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: With all of the neat good looks of wood and functional practicality of a venetian, the ecowood in espresso fine grain displays a dark brown wood effect on hardwearing slats. This quality faux wood is water-resistant and won't crack or warp, making it ideal for bathrooms and kitchens. Influence your kitchen with a soft monochrome scheme, going for brown or soft black worktops similar to the espresso fine grain and creamy off-white units.

products.title: Ecowood Fruitwood Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: With a dark mahogany tone, and a grained finish, the ecowood in fruitwood fine grain has a truly authentic look and feel, belying its pvc material. This durable, long-lasting blind is water-resistant so you can be sure that it won't warp or crack. Merge the fruitwood fine grain with duck egg blue walls in a traditionally styled living room. Incorporate polished wood furnishings and matching duck egg accessories, adding in a hint of teal for a quick burst of bold colouring.

products.title: Ecowood Provincial Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: In a light, orange-toned wood effect, the ecowood in provincial fine grain has a warm and cosy finish, with natural-looking wood grain texturing to give a feeling of true authenticity. Matching accessories, including a pelmet, bottom rail, and control cords, finish the look with ease. For a snug and homely ambience in the dining room, set the provincial fine grain against a mediterranean red, furnishing the room with matching woods in light and medium tones.

products.title: Spectrum Light Pearl - Venetian Blind
products.description: The pretty elegance of the spectrum light pearl will simply blow you away with its contemporary, quality design, pale cream hue, and durable aluminium slats. There is no colour-clashing to be found either, will coordinating cords and rails that blend perfectly with the rest of the blind. Harmonise with a creamy white colour scheme in the bathroom or kitchen, where the wipe-clean slats will come in extra handy.

products.title: Spectrum Almond - Venetian Blind
products.description: The creamy nuttiness of the spectrum in almond provides a beautiful neutral blind with a soft, satin finish. Quality aluminium slats and a sturdy pull-cord make this a practical choice for a family home where it will get plenty of use. Tame brightly patterned wallpapers in the kids' bedroom or playroom, where durability and sturdiness are a must. Or for a sophisticated look in the living room, team with a deep burgundy to promote a cosy and homely feel that you won't want to be away from.

products.title: Spectrum Dove Grey - Venetian Blind
products.description: The satin-finish dove grey from the spectrum range features a barely-there white-grey on hardwearing aluminium slats, that can be easily adjusted using the colour-matching pull-cords on the side of the blind. Use the dove grey as part of a white colour scheme in the bathroom, for something just a little darker, or use as a neutral to temper bold reds, rich plums, or dark greys in the living room or dining room.

products.title: Cream Filtra
products.description: Cream filtra perforated metal venetian blind.

products.title: Pearl
products.description: Pearl shimmer metal venetian blind.

products.title: Eco Friendly Fr Cream Recycled Roller Blind
products.description: Their eco-friendly, recycled roller blinds are made from 100% pet recycled waste. This means that you can decorate your window with your new sustainable blind, and contribute positively to the environment. For every sq. Metre of fabric, 9 pet bottles are used, so you'll be positively contributing to the fight on plastic pollution, as well as getting a stylish blind. Made with a moisture-resistant and flame-retardant coating, your new white roller blind can be just the thing to complete your bathroom or kitchen.

products.title: Lana Cream 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their beautiful lana range really creates that wow factor for an affordable price and is available in a range of on-trend colours with an attractive pattern. This cream vertical blind is the perfect addition to any room due to the neutral tone of the fabric which will go well with existing decor. products.title: Ecowood Driftwood Fine Grain - Venetian Blind
products.description: The ecowood in driftwood fine grain is a prettily textured piece in a light, natural wood tone, and with a realistic wood look. A practical and hardwearing blind that's simple and easy to use, it will look pretty and natural wherever it's placed. Create a simple yet elegantly organic scheme in a dining room by including naked woods and artisan fabrics as well as the lovely driftwood fine grain. Go for stark white walls and plenty of plant-life, adding bamboo accessories to add to the look.

products.title: Genesis Blackout Luxe Cream Linen 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: Their genesis luxe blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour match blockout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home. This neutral cream linen colour vertical blind is bang on trend so will look great in any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blockout the light when desired. products.title: Wow Factor Brushed Oyster - Venetian Blind
products.description: Sophisticated and discreet, the wow factor in brushed oyster is a classic brushed gold that combines class and subtlety. Crafted from durable, heavy gauge aluminium slats that are easy to tilt and move about, this is a blind that is built to last - in quality and style. For subdued glamour, use with dark navy blues, deep purples, or rich burgundys, accenting occasionally with pretty creams. These would all make flexible colour schemes, perfect in many rooms, including the living room, dining room, and master bedroom.

products.title: Palate Cream Roller Blind
products.description: The palate blackout roller blind range is a great option for bedrooms due to the blackout fabric blocking all light from passing through the fabric. With a range of colour to choose from in this range, you'll find a perfect match for your room. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material.

products.title: Ivory Aluminium Venetian
products.description: The ivory coloured aluminium venetian blind is a beautifully, creamy-white coloured slat. Ideal for anyone not wanting a pure white slat in their window, but want something that is warmer and more delicate. Keep your blinds looking their best with their easy to wipe clean aluminium slats, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Raise and lower your blind to the perfect height, and then angle the venetian slats to control the light entering your home.

products.title: Gloss Buttermilk Aluminium Venetian
products.description: Aluminium venetian blinds are perfect for controlling the light coming into your home, along with adding privacy and a stylish finish to your window. In a range of colours, these blinds are perfect for any decor. Keep your blinds looking their best with their easy to wipe clean aluminium slats, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Raise and lower your blind to the perfect height, and then angle the venetian slats to control the light entering your home.

products.title: Amor Campfire Smoke Roller Blind
products.description: The slightly darker grey colour of the amor campfire smoke is ideal for anyone looking for a stylish and modern, darker grey colour in their window. Pair this in with whites and soft greys in the rest of your home to create a relaxing environment to enjoy and relax within. These blinds are a blackout material so will block all of the light from passing through, making this a perfect blind for your bedroom.

products.title: Rochester Cream - Vertical Blind
products.description: For a sophisticated window dressing, opt for the elegant rochester in cream, where fine, silky threads shape a quality and beneficial blind with a captivating texture. This exquisite cloth, with both beauty and grace, hangs on adjustable louvres that allow you to alter the amount of light entering the room. Generate an elegant boudoir by including the dreamy texture of the cream amongst alike, opulent fabrics with similar shimmer and style.

products.title: Henderson Cream - Vertical Blind
products.description: Neatly opposing stitching forms the sophisticated stripes of the henderson cream, where a barely-there cream shade provides the canvas. The straight, vertical louvres help to form a sleek and streamlined appearance, accentuating that of the stripes. For a luxe and classic look in the master bedroom, settle the cream against matching cream walls and furnish with dark, polished woods to give a contrasting effect.

products.title: Richmond Cream - Vertical Blind
products.description: Adorned with feathery curved lines, in textured raised stitching, the richmond in cream is a subtle yet artistic piece, and its soft cream hue leaves nothing to be desired. Lightweight enough to feel light and airy, yet sturdy enough to hang neatly in louvres, this is a blind with both practical and stylish qualities. Team the cream with a bolder hue for maximum impact, choosing a deep maroon or burgundy for a grand look in the dining room.
